name: GZ Simulator
description:
Enter the nostalgia machine and relive your dankest college memories. Don't forget to turn off the lights before you leave.

Includes controller and VR support.

Update 2:

  • Have a seat! Over 30 places to sit in the basement.
  • Added aim reticule to highlight interactive objects.
  • Fixed cursor wonkiness. WebGL only: press Esc twice to pause.
  • More songs! Man the board to skip tracks.

Update 1:

  • Lights and switches for maximum immersion
  • Enabled but did not test OpenVR

Controls:

Move: WASD / Arrow keys / Left analog stick
Look: Mouse / Right analog stick
Look closer: Alt / Right click / Right trigger
Jump: Space / Y button
Sit/Stand/Toggle switch: Left Click / A button
Pause: Escape

Credits:

Basement model by Kyle McDonald
Door sounds and room tones by Blair Neal
Music performed by On a Scale of 1 to 10, Sassachu, Tony Olivo
First Person Drifter via torahhorse
Switch sound via Freesound
